title: Enhance the Blog
post:
We have some videos & Schumacher audio on our library page – http://shroudnm.com/library.html.
Russ Breault has a good audio/video selection – http://www.shrouduniversity.com/
You can also use the YouTube Video Channel – http://www.youtube.com/lijkwade/
author: Andy Weiss

title: Enhance the Blog
post: Thanks, Dan and Andy. If anybody else knows of any significant resources, please mention them. I’m especially interested in audio files on Shroud-related topics. I drive a lot, and I often use my MP3 player in my car.
author: Jason Engwer
